html: (2 Nephi 15:7)."He looked for judgment … for righteousness." This verse is the justification for the Lord's actions against the vineyard. He had looked for justice ("judgment") among His people but saw only injustice and bloodshed ("oppression"); He hoped to see righteousness but beheld only riotousness and raucousness. (See LDSKJ, Isaiah 5:7, footnote c.)
